DOC.brief_summary: Hemodialysis patient alter pulmonary function associate impaired endothelial function cardiovascular event . Respiratory muscle training ( RMT ) potential improve cardiovascular outcomes patient undergoing maintenance HD.This randomize controlled clinical trial include 41 patient undergoing thrice-weekly maintenance HD . Patients randomly assign 2:1 ratio receive RMT HD session 8 week . Main outcome change level biomarkers related endothelium activation ( vascular cell adhesion molecule 1 , VCAM-1 , intercellular adhesion molecule 1 , ICAM-1 ) , glycocalyx derangement ( syndecan-1 ) , aberrant angiogenesis ( angiopoietin-2 ) oxidative stress ( malondialdehyde ) baseline . Other outcome include change functional capacity pulmonary function test
DOC.brief_title: Respiratory Muscle Training Hemodialysis Patients : Effects Endothelium Oxidative Stress Biomarkers
DOC.criteria: patient receive thriceweekly maintenance HD least 3 month , cognitive physical ability perform study protocol procedure chronic pulmonary disease patient acute coronary syndrome , decompensated heart failure , major infectious process hospitalization within last 3 month .
